description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1cm82","text":"This protocol describes isolation of nuclei from 10 week old mouse adrenal glands from 8 founder strains (B6J, AJ, 129S1J, NZOJ, WSBJ, NODJ, PWKJ, and CASTJ), preparation of a single nucleus suspension, and fixation for single nucleus RNA-seq using Parse Biosciences. We process 1 rep from each strain per day; e.g. female rep 1 across all 8 strains. The main products we use are Parse Biosciences Nuclei Fixation Kit (v2) and Miltenyi Biotec’s gentleMACS Octo Dissociator with accessories. This protocol takes about 3.5 hours from start to finish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pq93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2t13p","text":"The results are 2 aliquots of fixed single-nucleus suspensions for Parse per each of the 8 samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8tlt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpubo","text":"We recommend using a 5 ml pipette for aspirations and resuspensions \u003e 1 ml.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fijcn","text":"Record everything in the IGVF spreadsheet, “Samples into experiment” tab.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":25,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":16}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"345C30AA438B11EEA8450A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13M6-Ry6oXgkx94BHZOGioYPI6F_hWDqjGgcaNu2JNYs/edit#gid=636074467"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bt89l","text":"Label tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2v06f","text":"Pre-chill centrifuge to 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9i2bu","text":"Prepare ice buckets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fp7he","text":"Prepare lysis buffer in a 50 ml conical tube on ice. Distribute 2 ml into 8 gentleMACS C Tubes on ice. Add RNase inhibitor to the lysis buffer aliquot the day of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbdnf","text":"Prepare NB + BSA + RNase inhibitor. Add RNase inhibitor included in Parse Biosciences fixation kit the day of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7s1kd","text":"Prepare 1.5 ml Nuclei Buffer + RNase inhibitor for final resuspension. Add 18.6 ul RNase inhibitor to 1.5 ml Nuclei Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rpiv","text":"Thaw components of 1 Parse Biosciences Nuclei Fixation v2 kit at room temperature, then place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vdig","text":"Distribute 20 ul NucBlue Fixed Cell ReadyProbes into 16 PCR strip tubes for cell counting. Need 8 tubes for counting after nuclei extraction, and another 8 tubes for final fixed nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8kfd1","text":"Keep flash frozen tissue samples on dry ice until lysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7b4bc","text":"Drop whole frozen tissue into a chilled gentleMACS C Tube with 2 ml lysis buffer. Close tubes firmly and invert immediately, ensuring tissue is not stuck to the bottom or side. Keep tubes on ice and proceed immediately to dissociation. There should be 2 adrenal glands.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etlvu","text":"Run the gentleMACS Program 4C_nuclei_1 on the Octo Dissociator (~5 minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67v2u","text":"Remove tubes, ensuring tissue did not get stuck on the sides, and spin down in a 4C centrifuge for ~10 seconds to bring liquid to the bottom, then place tubes back on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ug1k","text":"Filter nuclei suspension through 30 um MACS SmartStrainer into a 5 ml tube. Fit a tube rack in ice for extra stability while filtering.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8oh9p","text":"Wash 30 um MACS SmartStrainer with 2 ml additional lysis buffer. Add 2 ml to C tubes, cap, and swish to recover any nuclei stuck to the sides and cap of the C tubes, then wash the strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3k3be","text":"Discard strainer and centrifuge the 4 ml nuclei suspension at 4C, 350g for 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dl5i","text":"Discard supernatant and resuspend nuclei pellet in 375 ul NB-BSA + RNase inhibitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t0g8","text":"Filter the nuclei suspension (375 ul) NB-BSA + RNase inhibitor through a 40 um strainer (provided in Parse Biosciences kit) into a new 5 ml tube. Count nuclei. Use 1:6 dilution factor, e.g. 4 ul + 20 ul dye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"717pi","text":"Add 125 uL Nuclei Fixation Solution and mix 3 times. Do not over-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rd3h","text":"Incubate nuclei for 10 minutes on ice. Set 1 P200 pipette to 40 ul and keep the other P200 at 125 ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2f0n","text":"Add 40 uL Nuclei Permeabilization Solution and mix by pipetting 3 times with the P200 still set to 125 uL. Do not over-mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2p0a1","text":"Incubate 3 minutes with nuclei on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6shao","text":"Add 2 ml Nuclei Neutralization Solution and invert the tube once to mix. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1haeu","text":"Centrifuge at 4C, 750g for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cehi3","text":"Aspirate and discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5fvn","text":"Resuspend the samples in 150 ul Nuclei Buffer with RNase inhibitor without BSA and filter through a 40 um filter into a labeled 1.5 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fu26m","text":"Count nuclei. Use a 1:11 dilution factor, e.g. 2 ul + 20 ul dye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91nr0","text":"Add Nuclei DMSO: For 150 ul samples: add 2.5 ul and gently flick tubes to mix. One minute later, add another 2.5 ul and flick to mix, then after another minute add a final 2.5 ul for a total volume of 7.5 ul. Mix by gently pipetting 5x with a P200 set to 50 ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5q5g","text":"Split nuclei suspension into 2 aliquots of equal volume in labeled 1.5 ml tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dh6lc","text":"Place tubes in a Mr. Frosty at -80C. The next day, move tubes to boxes in -80C racks. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"126ts","text":"Move leftover nuclei suspension to labeled 2 ml tubes and spin at 4C, 750g for 5 minutes. Remove supernatant and flash-freeze nuclei in liquid nitrogen as dry pellets. Store at -80C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol to isolate and fix nuclei from flash frozen mouse adrenal glands for IGVF
title_html: Protocol to isolate and fix nuclei from flash frozen mouse adrenal glands for IGVF
